name: obs_jd
description: Observation date and time as Julian Date (JD). Derived from 'DATE_OBS'.

name: ra
description: Right Ascention (degrees) coordinate of where the telescope is pointed. Derived from 'OBJCTRA'.

name: dec
description: Declination (degrees) coordinate of where the telescope is pointed. Derived from 'OBJCTDEC'.

name: filename
description: Absolute path to the corresponding fits file on the Vega data server.

name: file_id
description: Combination of the folder date and file name to compare raw and processed files.
